events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team based on your experience with software development and relevant skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process and answer any questions you may have.
We conducted an initial screening of your skills and background, and everything looks promising for the engineering role you applied for.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions and sharing additional information about your technical skills and projects.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead developer to assess your coding capabilities.
